comment.author: 47819927@N00
comment._content: Is that the Inns of Virginia?

comment.author: 32402012@N05
comment._content: Yes, I think it is the Inn of Virginia, and I believe before that it was called Executive Inn, wasn't it? As you probably know, several scenes from the movie Forces of Nature were filmed there.

comment.author: 9638224@N07
comment._content: That is the Executive Inn...shame is they have surrounded it with a chainlink fence. That usually means demolision....sad

comment.author: 48395171@N03
comment._content: That was one cool motel - my dad stayed there in the 1960's while on business.  Shame they demolished it and it looked as if they didn't salvage any of the fixtures inside!
